segments.text: Can you recommend a resort to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about the Yellowstone National Park ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The scenery is so breathtaking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are thousands of hot springs and fountains . The park is known for them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The well-known Yellowstone Waterfall is formed when the Yellowstone Lake falls down into the Yellowstone Canyon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What an attractive place ! How can I get there ?
segments.speaker: S1
